page.title: 14Ghosts in Fremington
page.content: { {At 10:15pm one night in August 1977 Mr Victor Kelly (now our school caretaker) was on his way to work, appears to have seen a ghost at Fremington Church by the lychgate.It was a woman.The lady was about 28.She was dressed for a ball,wearing a long blue gown and sandals,and carrying a handbag.It was obvious that she came from another time in history.She also looked rich.Mr Kelly said she had a kind of smile on her face and she was healthy looking.She did not say anything to him.She walked about thirteen metres and disappeared into the wall.He has never seen her since. He went back about 3 times that night but he never saw har again.Mr Kelly thinks she was Lady McNeil who drowned on a beach saving a little boy.
